articles.description: Novak Djokovic reaches a record 47th men's Grand Slam semi-final with a straight-set win over Taylor Fritz at the US Open.
articles.title: Djokovic into record 47th Grand Slam semi-final

articles.description: England are convincingly beaten by six wickets by New Zealand in the fourth T20 at Trent Bridge as the Black Caps fight back to draw the series 2-2.
articles.title: England beaten as NZ fight back to draw T20 series

articles.description: American teenager Coco Gauff storms into the US Open semi-finals for the first time with a dominant win over Latvia's Jelena Ostapenko.
articles.title: 'Emotionally fresh' Gauff into US Open semi-finals

articles.description: American student athletes, who previously only received compensation from universities in the form of scholarships, can now earn money for endorsement deals. It is changing campus bank balances and the shape of stateside sport.
articles.title: The million-dollar hustle changing US sport

articles.description: Referees' chief Howard Webb says Manchester City's second goal against Fulham was offside, on the first episode of Match Officials: Mic'd Up.
articles.title: Ake goal for Man City against Fulham offside - Webb

articles.description: Watch New Zealand's "monster" sixes as they beat England by six wickets at Trent Bridge to draw the four-match T20 series.
articles.title: Watch NZ's 'monster' batting display to level T20 series

articles.description: Jorge Vilda, Spain's Women's World Cup-winning head coach, has been sacked amid the ongoing Luis Rubiales kiss row.
articles.title: Vilda sacked as Spain boss amid Rubiales scandal

articles.description: Flanker Tom Curry is set to play for England in their World Cup opener against Argentina after returning from an ankle injury.
articles.title: Curry set to start for England against Argentina

articles.description: England midfielder Jordan Henderson says criticism of his move to Saudi Arabian club Al-Ettifaq "really hurt".
articles.title: Criticism over Saudi move 'really hurt' - Henderson

articles.description: Watch the best shots from England opener Jonny Bairstow's 73 against New Zealand in the fourth and final T20 at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: Watch all of Bairstow's sixes as England lose to NZ
